summary: The video features a person lying down, discussing their extreme fear of the far-right and their difficulty in choosing between saving a human life and saving a bank. The speaker mentions various political figures and groups, including the Minister of something, Macron, GUD, and NPA, expressing frustration with the choices presented. The person appears distressed and contemplative.
keywords: extreme fear, far-right, Macron, GUD, NPA, human life, bank, choice, politics, France
